Entries.Evelyn: When I woke up I heard dripping from somewhere... I think the roof might be leaking.$s#$e#In the old days, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeName}} would've scampered right up and fixed it... *sigh*$s
Entries.Emily: It never rains in Calico Desert... That's where my friend {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SandyName}} lives.#$e#I wish I could've visited her today.$s
